mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarms (alarm_category, alarm_level, alarm_title, alarm_contents, alarm_sender, alarm_sender_nick, alarm_receiver, alarm_receiver_nick, alarm_read_date, alarm_accept_url, alarm_reject_url, alarm_navi_url) VALUES (#{alarmCategory}, #{alarmLevel}, #{alarmTitle}, #{alarmContents}, #{alarmSender}, #{alarmSenderNick}, #{alarmReceiver}, #{alarmReceiverNick}, #{alarmReadDate}, #{alarmAcceptUrl}, #{alarmRejectUrl}, #{alarmNaviUrl})
mapper.update: UPDATE alarms SET alarm_read_date = NOW() WHERE alarm_no = #{alarmNo}
UPDATE alarms SET alarm_hold = 1 WHERE alarm_no = #{alarmNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(alarm_no) FROM alarms WHERE alarm_receiver = #{userId} AND alarm_level IN (1, 2)

SELECT alarm_no, alarm_category, alarm_level, alarm_title, alarm_contents, alarm_sender, alarm_sender_nick, alarm_receiver, alarm_receiver_nick, alarm_reg_date, alarm_read_date, alarm_accept_url, alarm_reject_url, alarm_navi_url, alarm_hold FROM alarms WHERE alarm_receiver = #{searchKeyword} ORDER BY alarm_level ASC, alarm_reg_date ASC LIMIT #{mysqlStartRowNum}, #{pageSize}
